General.Name: Flour Mills Kepenos S.A.
General.Description: Flour Mills Kepenos S.A. produces and sells wheat and other cereals flours in Greece. The company provides yellow, bread-making, semolina, durum, soft, extra special, special, and whole meal wheat flours, as well as flour mixtures. It serves various industries, bakeries, patisseries, bakeshops, and small or large-scale businesses. The company was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Patras, Greece.
General.Address: Industrial area of Patras, Patras, Greece, 250 18
